list.name: Default
list.comment: Added the Orange ghost, who heads for Pac until he is within 5 blocks, and will then redirect away until out of range, and then give chase again. PacMan will now appropriately avoid any ghost that is near, rather than only the red one. PacMan will now lose a life and respawn at the start if he is caught by a ghost. Abstracted another layer between Sprite and a Ghost for differentiating a generic Ghost and other Sprite from each other. Refactored various code and removed some unused classes.

task.summary: Updated game world initialisation. Updated constructor of all GameObjects. Updated PacMan to understand his position in the game grid. Created default values for the Node data class. Fixed numerous errors and crashes.
A* Search implemented successfully. Implemented logic for pacman to move along a found path to a pill. Refactored a lot of dead/commented code out.

Pulled the A Star search into its own Singleton class.
Small code refactors.

PacMan now autonomously finds and consumes every single pill on the map. Added functionality to find the pill that is closest to PacMan's current location. Moved Pills into GameArray Node class rather than the object handler to improve performance and convenience.
Added the Ghost class, and an instance in the map upon startup. Pulled out a lot of Pacman's code into the more general Sprite class for reusability between ghosts and pacman. More refactors.

Added the notion of current direction to sprites, which prevents them from turning 180 degrees when choosing a new path. Abstracted some functionality from GameObject into a Sprite class for all Ghosts and Pacman.

Improved PacMan's decision making when choosing an escape location. Made the escape location more randomised to prevent the simulation from always running the exact same way. Added rotated images that correspond with PacMan's direction. GameArray now resets all of its values before each new path is formulated. Moved AStarSearch out of PacMan and Ghost to a single instantiable class for better OO principles and reuse. Moved GameObjects to class level. Major refactor of tonnes of code, for readability and better OO principles.

MESSAGE.value: Updated game world initialisation. Updated constructor of all GameObjects. Updated PacMan to understand his position in the game grid. Created default values for the Node data class. Fixed numerous errors and crashes.
Pushing through the A Star search further
A* Search implemented successfully. Implemented logic for pacman to move along a found path to a pill. Refactored a lot of dead/commented code out.
Implemented dynamic level loading from buffered images. Updated rendering to reflect the walls. Usual refactors.

Added a bunch of Factory classes. Major refactor of most of the code into separate classes, with proper OO. Pulled some functionality into interfaces. Created proper package structure for the program. Major abstractions created.

Pulled the A Star search into its own Singleton class.
Small code refactors.

PacMan now autonomously finds and consumes every single pill on the map. Added functionality to find the pill that is closest to PacMan's current location. Moved Pills into GameArray Node class rather than the object handler to improve performance and convenience.
Added the Ghost class, and an instance in the map upon startup. Pulled out a lot of Pacman's code into the more general Sprite class for reusability between ghosts and pacman. More refactors.

Added the notion of current direction to sprites, which prevents them from turning 180 degrees when choosing a new path. Abstracted some functionality from GameObject into a Sprite class for all Ghosts and Pacman.

Improved PacMan's decision making when choosing an escape location. Made the escape location more randomised to prevent the simulation from always running the exact same way. Added rotated images that correspond with PacMan's direction. GameArray now resets all of its values before each new path is formulated. Moved AStarSearch out of PacMan and Ghost to a single instantiable class for better OO principles and reuse. Moved GameObjects to class level. Major refactor of tonnes of code, for readability and better OO principles.

Added the Orange ghost, who heads for Pac until he is within 5 blocks, and will then redirect away until out of range, and then give chase again. PacMan will now appropriately avoid any ghost that is near, rather than only the red one. PacMan will now lose a life and respawn at the start if he is caught by a ghost. Abstracted another layer between Sprite and a Ghost for differentiating a generic Ghost and other Sprite from each other. Refactored various code and removed some unused classes.

Abstracted another layer between Sprite and a Ghost for differentiating a generic Ghost and other Sprite from each other. Refactored various code and removed some unused classes.
